# Init Generator

## `default`

### `directory`

- **Type**: `string`

> Directory

The directory to create the library in

## `directory`

- **Type**: `string`

> Directory

The directory to initialize the workspace in

## `skipFormat`

- **Type**: `boolean`

> Skip Format

Skip formatting the generated files
